title: Analyze change in traffic flow in an intersection

content.question: Is the traffic flow increasing or decreasing at t = 7? Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Is the traffic flow increasing or decreasing at t = 7? Give a reason for your answer.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing
